TopicTitle: So what would you guys think of me setting up a Hack/Mine server?

Articles.Content: Note, this won\'t be up too often. The reason being is because well, I do run a tekkit server too. And that\'s for my close friends. So, if you want to know which type of server it is, know this: I will change the MOTD to either tekkit, or to Hack/Mine. That is how you tell. Oh, don\'t try to join the tekkit one. It\'s first off got a whitelist then second I\'ll kick you.

Are you talking about minecraft?

Or are you drunk?
Herp. It\'s a minecraft server. It\'s called HACK/MINE for a reason.
